course.subject: CPEG
course.name: Computer Engineering Final Year Thesis in COMP
course.description: Each student taking the Research Option of the Computer Engineering program is required to complete an individual thesis before graduation. The student is expected to conduct a research on a topic related to Computer Engineering and/or its application. The thesis is conducted under the supervision of faculty members from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering. Credit load will be spread over the year. Instructor's approval is required for enrollment in the course. For CPEG students only.
